unknownAccountOrIncorrectState: Account not found or not in the appropriate state to make changes.
password: Password required and expected to match account
id: Must be a recognized document ID
verificationCode: Verification code must match account secret
confirmationPassword: Password must match the confirmation field
enum: `{{value}}` is not a recognized value. Please enter: {{acceptable}}.
unique: Must be unique and `{{value}}` is taken
isUrl: Must be a valid website, including its top-level domain and HTTP protocol
isMongoId: Must be a valid Mongo document ID
scope: Pricing must include either global, vendor or sku value
email: Must be a valid email address
phone: Must be a valid phone number
